title: Save the plate app
description: Discover the best foods at the most affordable prices!

landing.welcome_description: Discover amazing Rescue Packs from local bakeries, caf√©s, and restaurants. Enjoy great food at friendly prices while making a positive impact on the environment.
landing.badge_text: Save food. Save money. Save the planet.
landing.quote: Every Rescue Pack is a win for your wallet and the planet.
landing.why_subtitle: Join thousands of people making a difference, one meal at a time
landing.save_money_desc: Get delicious food at up to 50% off regular prices. Great deals on quality meals from local businesses.
landing.save_planet_desc: Reduce food waste and help the environment. Every meal you rescue prevents CO‚ÇÇ emissions and saves water.
landing.support_local_desc: Help local businesses reduce waste while discovering amazing food from your neighborhood.
landing.quick_easy_desc: Browse, order, and pick up in minutes. Simple process with QR code verification for seamless experience.
landing.make_difference_desc: Track your environmental impact. See how many meals you've saved and your contribution to the planet.
landing.surprise_packs_desc: Discover exciting Rescue Packs with a variety of items. Each pack is a delightful surprise at a great price.
landing.how_subtitle: Simple steps to start rescuing food and saving money
landing.step1_desc: Explore available Rescue Packs and custom offers from local businesses near you.
landing.step2_desc: Select your favorite pack, place an order, and receive a unique QR code for pickup.
landing.step3_desc: Visit the store, show your QR code, and enjoy delicious food while saving the planet!
landing.business_desc: Turn your surplus food into revenue while reducing waste. Join local businesses making a positive impact.
landing.business_benefit1: Reduce food waste and disposal costs
landing.ready_desc: Join our community of food rescuers and start saving money while helping the planet today.

impact.title: Environmental Impact
impact.description: Every meal you save from waste makes a real difference. Learn how we calculate your environmental impact and the positive change you're creating.
impact.problem_intro: Food waste is one of the biggest environmental challenges of our time. When food goes to waste:
impact.problem_1: It decomposes in landfills, producing methane gas - a greenhouse gas 25 times more potent than CO‚ÇÇ
impact.problem_2: All the water, energy, and resources used to produce that food are wasted
impact.problem_3: It contributes to climate change and environmental degradation
impact.problem_4: It represents a massive economic loss for businesses and consumers
impact.problem_conclusion: By rescuing food that would otherwise be wasted, you're directly reducing these negative impacts!
impact.meals_saved_description: This represents the total number of meals or food packages you've rescued from going to waste.
impact.meals_calculation: Each confirmed order counts as meals saved. If you order 3 rescue packs, that's 3 meals saved!
impact.co2_description: Carbon dioxide equivalent (CO‚ÇÇe) represents the greenhouse gas emissions prevented by saving food from waste.
impact.co2_calculation: We use a conservative estimate: 1.5 kg CO‚ÇÇe per meal saved
impact.co2_explanation: This accounts for methane emissions from food waste decomposition (methane is 25x more potent than CO‚ÇÇ) and the emissions from food production that would have been wasted.
impact.co2_equivalent: üí° Real-world equivalent: 1 tree absorbs approximately 21 kg of CO‚ÇÇ per year. So saving 14 meals ‚âà planting 1 tree!
impact.water_description: Water footprint represents all the water used in the production, processing, and transportation of food.
impact.water_calculation: We estimate: 1,500 liters of water per meal saved
impact.water_explanation: This includes water for irrigation, processing, cleaning, and all stages of the food supply chain. The average person drinks about 2-3 liters per day, so saving one meal saves enough water for about 500-750 days of drinking water!
impact.for_customers_description: Every order you place directly saves food from waste. Your impact grows with each rescue pack or offer you purchase!
impact.customer_1: Each confirmed order counts toward your environmental impact
impact.customer_2: Track your savings and impact on your profile page
impact.customer_3: Share your achievements and inspire others!
impact.for_providers_description: By listing your surplus food, you're preventing waste at the source. Every offer you create has the potential to save multiple meals!
impact.provider_1: Each confirmed order from your offers contributes to environmental savings
impact.provider_2: Reduce waste disposal costs while helping the planet
impact.provider_3: Build a sustainable business model that customers love
impact.ripple_description: Your individual actions create a collective impact. When thousands of people participate, the environmental benefits multiply exponentially!
impact.ready_description: Every meal counts. Start rescuing food today and watch your environmental impact grow!

add_offer.subtitle: Set your own title, description, price, and photos. Perfect for specific items or special promotions! üíö

add_offer.step1_tip: Start with a clear title and add photos to make your offer stand out!
add_offer.step2_tip: Set competitive prices to attract customers. Don't forget to add quantity!
add_offer.step3_tip: Choose when customers can pick up. Use quick presets or set custom times.
add_offer.step4_tip: Help customers find your offer by selecting the right categories.

The prices shown are just recommendations - you can change them if they don't suit your offer! Perfect for quick listings when you have mixed surplus items! üçûü•êüçì

home.step1_content: This is your home page where you can discover available food offers from local businesses.
home.step2_content: If you have pending orders, you'll see a banner here. Click 'View Orders' to manage them.
home.step3_content: Browse through all available offers here. Click on any offer to see details and place an order.
home.step4_content: Use this button to refresh and see the latest available offers.
home.step5_content: Use the top navigation menu to access Home, Orders, Profile, Impact, and Contact pages. On desktop, all options are visible here.
home.step6_content: On mobile devices, use the bottom navigation bar for quick access to Home, Orders, and Profile.

home.step1_content: This is where you manage all your published offers. You can view, edit, or delete them here.
home.step2_content: Click this button to create a new offer. You can create custom offers or quick rescue packs.
home.step3_content: All your published offers appear here. Click on any offer card to edit or delete it.
home.step4_content: Use the top navigation menu to access Home, Profile, Publish, Orders, Impact, and Contact pages. On desktop, all options are visible here.
home.step5_content: On mobile devices, use the bottom navigation bar for quick access to Home, Publish, Orders, and Profile.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Save The Plate ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
use.communication: To communicate with you about orders, offers, and updates
use.improvement: To analyze usage patterns and improve user experience
use.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
use.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
sharing.providers: With food providers when you place an order (name, phone, order details)
sharing.service: With service providers who assist us in operating our app (under strict confidentiality agreements)
sharing.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.correction: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your data
rights.objection: Right to object to processing of your data
rights.deletion_note: To request deletion of your data, please visit our

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our app and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.content: Our app uses third-party services that may collect information used to identify you:
third_party.analytics: Google Analytics for app usage analytics

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

data_deletion.title: Data Deletion Request
data_deletion.subtitle: Request deletion of your account and personal data

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.content: Requesting data deletion is permanent and cannot be undone. All your account information, order history, and preferences will be permanently removed from our system.

what_will_be_deleted.title: What Will Be Deleted
what_will_be_deleted.profile: Your profile information (name, email, phone, location)
what_will_be_deleted.offers: All your published offers (if you are a provider)

what_will_remain.title: What May Remain
what_will_remain.legal: Data we are legally required to retain (e.g., transaction records for tax purposes)
what_will_remain.aggregate: Aggregated, anonymized data that cannot identify you

how_to_request.title: How to Request Deletion
how_to_request.content: To request deletion of your data, please fill out the form below with the email address associated with your account. We will process your request within 30 days.

alternative.title: Alternative Method
alternative.content: You can also send us an email directly with your deletion request:

success.title: Request Received
success.message: We have received your data deletion request. Our team will process it within 30 days. You will receive a confirmation email once your data has been deleted.
success.timeline: We typically process deletion requests within 30 days. You will receive a confirmation email once the process is complete.

data_deletion.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
data_deletion.error: Failed to submit request. Please try again.
data_deletion.email_body_template:
Hello,

I would like to request deletion of my account and all associated data.

Email: {email}

Please delete all my personal data from your system.

Thank you.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.info: Choose your preferred payment method. Currently, cash payment is available at pickup.
payment.cashDesc: Pay with cash when you pick up your order
payment.creditCardDesc: Pay securely with your credit or debit card

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.noteText: Changing the language will update the app interface immediately.

help.title: Need Help?
help.subtitle: We're here to assist you with any questions or issues
help.contactUsDesc: Get in touch with our support team
help.privacyPolicyDesc: Learn how we protect your data
help.emailSupportDesc: Send us an email for assistance
help.faq1Question: How do I place an order?
help.faq1Answer: Browse available offers, select the items you want, and place your order. You'll receive a QR code for pickup.
help.faq2Question: When can I pick up my order?
help.faq2Answer: Check the pickup deadline on your order. Make sure to collect your order before the expiration date.
help.faq3Answer: Currently, we accept cash payments at pickup. More payment options are coming soon.

toasts.login_link_sent: We sent you a login link. Be sure to check your spam too.
toasts.error_generic: There was an error, please try again.
